Class DocIndexerXml

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.index.DocIndexerAbstract
      • nl.inl.blacklab.index.DocIndexerXml
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocIndexer

    public abstract class DocIndexerXml
extends DocIndexerAbstract
    Abstract base class for a DocIndexer processing XML files.

        Returns:
        the escaped string

      • escapeXmlChars

        public String escapeXmlChars(char[] source,
                    int start,
                    int length)
        Escape the special XML chars (<, >, &, ") with their named entity equivalents. NOTE: copy of StringUtil.escapeXmlChars that re-uses its StringBuilder for increased memory efficiency.
        Parameters:
        source - the source string
        start - where in the string to start processing
        length - how many characters to process
        Returns:
        the escaped string
